ai-tha-ap518:0.3_0: Hermits to the elders, the senior monks,
ai-tha-ap518:1.1_0: “Most people are on the bank of the rivers,
ai-tha-ap518:1.2_0: what I was afflicted with food,
ai-tha-ap518:2.2_0: I was born in a lower world
ai-tha-ap518:3.1_0: since the legal procedure of ejection was
ai-tha-ap518:4.1_0: Thirty-six times I was lord of gods,
ai-tha-ap518:4.2_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap518:4.4_0: they build a large beast of rice.
ai-tha-ap518:6.2_0: then he went forth to homelessness.
ai-tha-ap518:7.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap518:9.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap518:10.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pajjota.
ai-tha-ap518:11.1_0: The sixth gambler, with senior monks.
